title: My google pixel 4a (bought it 5month) ago but i want to put my phone on speaker and it doesn't work
content:
I have bought a google pixel 4a ,5 months ago but now without any reason when I want to call and talk on speaker with any apps or normal calls no one can hear me .I can hear the other person talking but they can hear me while it's on speaker or video calls .
They can see my video but Can hear me .I'm in Australia and I got the phone from office work
